00021 #ifndef PLATFORMENGINE_H
00022 #define PLATFORMENGINE_H
00023 
00024 #include <stack>
00025 
00026 #include "SDL.h"
00027 
00028 namespace Platform {
00029 
00030 // Forward reference to GameState class.
00031 class GameState;
00032 
00033 using std::stack;
00034 
00035 /**********************************************************/
00042 class PlatformEngine {
00043   public:
00044     PlatformEngine();
00045 
00046     //** Prepares engine subsystems and assets
00047     void Init();
00048 
00049     //** Clears up any engine assets before the program ends.
00050     void Cleanup();
00051 
00052     //** Loads the initial engine state from the script
00053     void StartState();
00054 
00055     //** Explicitly changes the state of the engine.
00056     void ChangeState( GameState* state );
00057 
00058     //** Puts a new state onto the engine state stack.
00059     void PushState( GameState* state, char* scriptPath = NULL );
00060     
00061     //** Ends the top state on the engine stack.
00062     void PopState();
00063 
00064     //** Processes user input events.
00065     void HandleEvents();
00066 
00067     //** Brings the game logic up-to-date.
00068     void Update();
00069 
00070     //** Draws necessary surfaces to the screen.
00071     void Draw();
00072 
00073     //** Returns whether or not the game loop is running.
00074     bool Running() { return running; }
00075 
00076     //** Halts the game loop.
00077     void Quit() { running = false; }
00078   
00079   private:
00080     //** Stack of game states. The top state is the active one.
00081     stack< GameState* > stateStack;
00082 
00083     //** The primary SDL_Surface that images are drawn to.
00084     SDL_Surface* mainScreen;
00085 
00086     //** Controls whether or not the game loop is active.
00087     bool running;
00088 
00089     //** The complete title of the game; used in window header
00090     char* fullTitle;
00091 };
00092 
00093 } // namespace Platform
00094 
00095 #endif
